name: Archetype Fantasy Miniseries Cloaks
additionalNotes: Archetype Fantasy Miniseries moves away from the three former factories of the Archetype series, this time partnering with the Oliva family and their factory in Nicaragua. Three blends have been made: Crystals, Curses, and Cloaks. Each cigar has been made in a singular 5? x 50 robusto format and will retail for $9. Two of the blends incorporate a closed foot and pigatil cap, while the third will be box-pressed. Cloaks is box-pressed.
